Uses of Interface
org.wiredwidgets.cow.server.transform.v2.ActivityBuilder

  • Packages that use ActivityBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.wiredwidgets.cow.server.transform.v2  

    • Uses of ActivityBuilder in org.wiredwidgets.cow.server.transform.v2

      Classes in org.wiredwidgets.cow.server.transform.v2 that implement ActivityBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActivityBuilderImpl<T extends Activity>
      Abstract base implementation for ActivityBuilder subclasses
      class  BypassableActivityBuilder 
      class  ComplexSetActivityBuilder 
      class  DecisionActivityBuilder
      A Decision is implemented as a task with transitions to multiple Activities This requires multiple lastNode instances
      class  ExitActivityBuilder 
      class  GatewayDecisionActivityBuilder
      For BPMN2 we need to use gateway nodes on either side of the options
      class  GatewayLoopActivityBuilder
      A Loop is implemented as an Activity followed by a Task in which a decision is made This requires multiple lastNode instances
      class  LoopActivityBuilder
      A Loop is implemented as an Activity followed by a Task in which a decision is made This requires multiple lastNode instances
      class  ParallelSetActivityBuilder
      Builds a set of parallel activities.
      class  ScriptActivityBuilder 
      class  SequentialSetActivityBuilder 
      class  ServiceTaskActivityBuilder 
      class  SignalActivityBuilder 
      class  SubProcessActivityBuilder 
      class  TaskActivityBuilder 
      Methods in org.wiredwidgets.cow.server.transform.v2 that return ActivityBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected ActivityBuilder ActivityBuilderImpl.createActivityBuilder(Activity activity) 
      ActivityBuilder ActivityBuilderFactoryFactory.createActivityBuilder(ProcessContext context, Activity activity)
      Select the correct ActivityBuilderFactory instance and calls the createActivityBuilder method on that instance.
      protected ActivityBuilder AbstractProcessBuilder.createActivityBuilder(ProcessContext context, Activity activity)
      Create an ActivityBuilder instance based on the ProcessContext and Activity
      ActivityBuilder GatewayDecisionActivityBuilderFactory.createActivityBuilder(ProcessContext context, Decision decision) 
      ActivityBuilder GatewayLoopActivityBuilderFactory.createActivityBuilder(ProcessContext context, Loop loop) 
      abstract ActivityBuilder ActivityBuilderFactory.createActivityBuilder(ProcessContext context, T activity)
      Creates the ActivityBuilder of the desired type and activity.
      protected ActivityBuilder ActivityBuilderFactory.createActivityBuilderFromFactory(ProcessContext context, Activity activity)
      Obtains the appropriate factory from the ActivityBuilderFactoryFactory and then calls createActivityBuilder Note name difference to distinguish this from the createActivityBuilder method that is implemented by the factory instance
